Android App Release Notes

Android App Release Notes
Dear Android App user, find below the changes and known issues in the Andriod App that need your attention. Important new items:
New Dialog for Manage Accounts
Support for URL shortcut files
New setting to remove automatically downloaded files
New setting to remove manually local storage
Automatic discovery
Password generator
Other improvements:
Feedback section changed
Device’s clear button re-enabled
Filtering in spaces list
Performance in av. Security Improvements
Improve biometric authentication security:
#4180
Notable Enhancements
New MDM functionalities, see:
#4249
and
#4288
Thumbnail improvements in grid view:
#4145
Auto upload in oCIS accounts allows upload to any space:
#4117
"Share to" in oCIS accounts allows upload to any space:
#4088
Android App 4.1.1
General
This is a bugfix release only. Notable Enhancements
Show "More" button for every file list item:
#2885
Added "Open in web" options to main file list:
#3860
Force security if not protected:
#4061
Prevent http traffic with branding options:
#4066

Android App 4.4.0
General
This release contains bugfixes, changes and enhancements. Issues Fixed
Rely on resharing capability:
#4397
Shares in non-root are updated correctly:
#4432
List filtering not working after rotating device:
#4441
The color of some elements is set up correctly:
#4442
Audio player does not work:
#4474
Enhancements
Improved "Remove from original folder" option in auto-upload:
#4357
Improved accessibility of information and relationships:
#4362
Changed the color of some elements to improve accessibility:
#4364
Improved SearchView accessibility:
#4365
Roles added to some elements to improve accessibility:
#4373
Hardware keyboard support:
#4438
Hardware keyboard support for passcode view:
#4447
TalkBack announces the view label correctly:
#4458
Android App 4.3.0
General
This release contains bugfixes, changes and enhancements. Android App 4.2.0
General
This release contains enhancements, bugfixes and security improvements. Android App 4.1.0
General
This release contains enhancements and bugfixes.

Refer to the full change log for a list of bug fixes and changes at
GitHub
. Refer to the full change log for a list of bug fixes and changes at
GitHub
. Fixed some crashes in 4.2.0:
#4318
Refer to the full change log for a list of bug fixes and changes at
GitHub
. Refer to the full change log for a list of bug fixes and changes at
GitHub
. Some Null Pointer Exceptions avoided:
#4158
Thumbnails correctly shown for every user:
#4189
Refer to the full change log for a list of bug fixes and changes at
GitHub
. Refer to the full change log for a list of bug fixes and changes at
GitHub
.

offline
Warning for http connections
Bugfixing, accessibility and tiny UI improvements
Issues Fixed
Removed unnecessary requests when the app is installed from scratch:
#4213
"Clear data" button enabled in the app settings in device settings:
#4309
Video streaming in spaces:
#4328
Retried successful uploads are cleaned up from the temporary folder:
#4335
Resolve incorrect truncation of long display names in Manage Accounts:
#4351
Av. offline files are not removed when "Local only" option is clicked:
#4353
Unwanted DELETE operations when synchronization in single file fails:
#6638
Changes
Upgrade minimum SDK version to Android 7.0 (v24):
#4230
Automatic discovery of the account in login:
#4301
Enhancements
Add search functionality to spaces list:
#3865
Get personal space quota from GraphAPI:
#3874
Correct "Local only" option in remove dialog:
#3936
Show app provider icon from endpoint:
#4105
Improvements in Manage Accounts view:
#4148
New setting for manual removal of local storage:
#4174
New setting for automatic removal of local files:
#4175
Avoid unnecessary requests when an av. offline folder is refreshed:
#4197
Add a warning in http connections:
#4284
Make dialog more Android-alike:
#4303
Password generator for public links in oCIS:
#4308
New UI for "Manage accounts" view:
#4312
Improvements in remove dialog:
#4342
Content description in UI elements to improve accessibility:
#4360
Added contentDescription attribute in the previewed image:
#4360
Support for URL shortcut files:
#4413
Changes in the Feedback section:
#6594
Android App 4.2.1
General
This is a bugfix release only.
Update as soon as possible. Update as soon as possible.
